attributes.action: Stop postal workers and public sector workers from striking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This week many people have been inconvenienced by the selfishness of postal workers striking, mainly to the expense of small businesses.

We the undersigned propose that the Prime Minister bans these strikes, as well as other public sector workers from striking and disrupting peoples lives.

Strike action increases public hostility to these workers and peaceful means of increasing pay and working conditions must be sought.
